name: rrxsuppss
params: setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0
body: -| wceq(c2, crab(s0, co(cr, cmap, c1), wbr(cv(s0), cfsupp, nat0)))

stmt.origin: fssdm(co(c0, csupp, nat0), c1, c0, cr, w0)

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wss(co(c0, csupp, nat0), c1))
-| wss(co(c0, csupp, nat0), cdm(c0))
-| wi(w0, wf(c0, c1, cr))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wss(co(c0, csupp, nat0), c1))
-| wss(co(c0, csupp, nat0), cdm(c0))
-| wi(w0, wf(c0, c1, cr))

|- wi(w0, wss(co(c0, csupp, nat0), c1))
-| wi(w0, wf(c0, c1, cr))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wf(c0, c1, cr))
-| wceq(c2, crab(s0, co(cr, cmap, c1), wbr(cv(s0), cfsupp, nat0)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c2))
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsc(s0, c1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wss(co(c0, csupp, nat0), c1))
-| wceq(c2, crab(s0, co(cr, cmap, c1), wbr(cv(s0), cfsupp, nat0)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c2))
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsc(s0, c1)

comment: Support of Euclidean vectors. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 7-Jul-2019.)
